title: Health Checkup
description: We prioritize our patient's health with the help of our most experienced and certified physicians. We conduct the health checkup of our client with the best intruments and technologies of its kind

title: Operation Theater
description: Our operation theater is filled with world-class medical instruments and machines. We can assure you the best treatment with the assistance of our experienced nad certified surgeons and doctors.

title: Intensive Care
description: We treat our patients with great care. Our intensive care unit is dedicated to every single moment of care of our ill patient. We sincerely observe all the fluctuation of our patients situation.

title: Lab Tests
description: Laboratory test in our hostpital is enriched with modern medical intruments and machinces. Our lab test is one of the top throughout the country when it comes to the accuracy of our patient's test

title: Pharmacy Support
description: You can find varity of medical drugs in our dispensary and you will find almost all the drugs within an affordable range of pricing. Even some of the medicine have flat discount on their pricing.

title: Ambulance Car
description: Our ambulance car service is open for 24/7 days. We operate smooth and confortable service in terms of providing ambulance. The drivers of ambulence are also highly experienced and BTRC licensed
